title: Julietta Is Hiring An Office & Logistics Coordinator In Dumbo, Brooklyn
description: Julietta is a jewelry brand with a strong following among fashion insiders, known for its vintage-inspired yet modern designs. Each piece is handcrafted in our Dumbo, Brooklyn atelier and has been worn by celebrities, influencers, and tastemakers worldwide. In just three years, we've grown rapidly, ...Continue reading
author: Winnie Liu
